Text: Doesn't seem to be working. If you run the RevLoader.exe you just get, "This application has failed to start because d3dx9_41.dll was not found."

@khohusen

First go to:
http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?d3dx9_41

And download the dll-file. After you've done that locate your windows-folder (C:\WINDOWS) and copy the dll-file to that folder. 

If it still doesn't run after you've done that, try updating your version of direct X. 

Hope you manage to get it working
